shortDescription: Microstrategy Web, version 7, does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability via the Login.asp Msg parameter.  NOTE: this is a deprecated product.
vulnerabilityName: microstrategy microstrategy_web Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
